name: Zee And The Quest For The Red Gems
name_original: Zee And The Quest For The Red Gems
description: Zee And the Quest For the Red Gems is a 2.5D platformer where you steal a gem and return it back to the start of the level. Avoid enemies and transverse over platforms and environments. Discover secrets and earn high scores in record time. Travel through each level both forwards and backwards retrieving the gem half way through the level and making a swift dash back to the cannon to clear the level.
